languages.text: "Воздух пронизан страхом добычи, которой некуда деться с этого мон-кайского ведра и которой остается только ждать, когда охотники доберутся до нее..."

traits.locale_text: "Воздух пронизан страхом добычи, которой некуда деться с этого монкайского ведра и которой остается только ждать, когда охотники доберутся до нее..."

languages.text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."
languages.original_text: "Воздух пронизан страхом добычи, которой некуда деться с этого мон-кайского ведра и которой остается только ждать, когда охотники доберутся до нее..."

"The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."

languages.text: 「このモン＝ケイのポンコツ船は、逃げ場を失った獲物の恐怖が空気に満ちている…あとは、狩人がやって来るのを待つばかりだ…」
languages.original_text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."

traits.locale_text: 「このモン＝ケイのポンコツ船は、逃げ場を失った獲物の恐怖が空気に満ちている…あとは、狩人がやって来るのを待つばかりだ…」

languages.text: "Die Angst der Beute, die nicht aus diesem Chem-Pan-Sey-Kübel fliehen kann, hängt schwer in der Luft. Sie kann nur warten, bis die Jäger kommen ..."
languages.original_text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Angst der Beute, die nicht aus diesem Chem-Pan-Sey-Kübel fliehen kann, hängt schwer in der Luft. Sie kann nur warten, bis die Jäger kommen ..."

languages.text: « L'air est imprégné de peur, celle des proies qui savent qu'elles sont prises au piège dans ce tas de ferraille mon-keigh et ne peuvent qu'attendre l'arrivée des chasseurs... »
languages.original_text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."

traits.locale_text: « L'air est imprégné de peur, celle des proies qui savent qu'elles sont prises au piège dans ce tas de ferraille mon-keigh et ne peuvent qu'attendre l'arrivée des chasseurs... »

languages.text: «El aire está impregnado del miedo de una presa que no tiene adónde huir de este cubo mon-keigh; lo único que puede hacer es esperar a que los cazadores vayan a por ella...».
languages.original_text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."

traits.locale_text: «El aire está impregnado del miedo de una presa que no tiene adónde huir de este cubo mon-keigh; lo único que puede hacer es esperar a que los cazadores vayan a por ella...».

languages.text: “空气中弥漫着猎物的恐惧。他们被困在猴子的铁桶里，只能绝望地等待猎人到来……”
languages.original_text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."

traits.locale_text: “空气中弥漫着猎物的恐惧。他们被困在猴子的铁桶里，只能绝望地等待猎人到来……”

languages.text: "Hava, bu mon-keigh çukurundan kaçacak yeri olmayan kurbanların korkusuyla kaplı. Tek yapabilecekleri, avcılarını beklemek..."
languages.original_text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."

traits.locale_text: "Hava, bu mon-keigh çukurundan kaçacak yeri olmayan kurbanın korkusuyla kaplı. Tek yapabileceği, avcılarını beklemek..."

languages.original_text: "The air is suffused with the fear of prey that has nowhere to run from this mon-keigh bucket — all it can do is wait for the hunters to come..."
